name: DailyBot
headline: AI Assistant and Chat Add-ons for Work
description:
DailyBot is a chat AI Assistant and Workflow Automation platform. It takes chat to a new level by providing automation and chat use-cases that are underserved by the current messaging platforms. It helps users get more things done within the chat to be more efficient and save time.

The new generation lives in chat. Remote/hybrid teams use DailyBot to automate daily workflows like stand-ups, team check-ins, give kudos to teammates or even to create their own chat-automation for their back-office with no-code/low-code in an environment similar to Amazon Alexa. DailyBot offers numerous add-ons to make the work experience better.

DailyBot provides a ChatGPT assistant and a unique AI Workflows tool. Users can build multi-step workflows that use AI to generate content, process information and run actions.

DailyBot is cross platform and already available for Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Chat and Discord.

Keywords: chatops chat-ops async nocode assistant workflow automation developer

**DailyBot: Your AI-Powered Workplace Assistant**

Founded in 2021 as part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, DailyBot is redefining how teams collaborate in the age of remote and hybrid work. Based in Pereira, Colombia, and equipped with a dynamic team of 12, DailyBot is on a mission to elevate workplace communication through its chat AI Assistant and workflow automation tools.

### Why DailyBot?

In a world where communication primarily happens in chat, DailyBot stands out by filling gaps that are often neglected by existing messaging platforms. It transforms everyday chat into a productive workspace by automating tasks like daily stand-ups, team check-ins, and even giving kudos to teammates. With DailyBot, users can create no-code or low-code workflows that simplify administrative back-office operations. 

### Powerful Features

DailyBot isn't just another chat tool‚Äîit's a robust platform that integrates seamlessly across popular chat platforms like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Chat, and Discord. Key features include:

- **AI Workflows**: Create multi-step processes that leverage AI to generate content and automate tasks.
- **Smart Reports and Team Analytics**: Get AI-generated summaries of team activities, helping you track progress and bottlenecks.
- **Kudos and Recognition Tools**: Foster positive team culture by celebrating accomplishments and recognizing effort.

### A Platform for Everyone

No matter your role, DailyBot aims to make you feel heard and supported. From marketing teams tracking campaign performance to developers managing code release workflows, its versatility is appealing. For those in charge of people operations, it even includes wellness check-ins to track the team's mood and wellbeing.

### Customer-Centric Approach

DailyBot has garnered praise from users, who extol its ability to reduce unnecessary meetings and enhance team alignment‚Äîregardless of time zones. Testimonials highlight how the platform has improved productivity and made workflows smoother across teams.

### The Road Ahead

As DailyBot continues to evolve, its commitment to automating and enhancing workplace interaction will only deepen. With ambitions to build the largest library of workflows for modern teams, the future looks bright.

If you're looking to streamline your team's communication and automate routine tasks, visit [DailyBot](https://www.dailybot.com/) and see how it can transform the way you work.
